trans-unit.source: Represents the base class from which custom expression writers must derive to write custom expressions.
trans-unit.target: 表示自定义表达式编写器必须从中派生编写自定义表达式的基类。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reports on how the object uses fields and properties in the context type.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，报告对象的上下文类型中如何使用字段和属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"></xref> method to store fields and properties read by a condition or read by an action.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAnalysis"> </xref>方法字段和属性存储由条件读取或读取操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression is being read from; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the expression is not being read from.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果正在从; 读取表达式<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果表达式不正在从读取。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression is being written to; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the expression is not being written to.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果写入表达式，则受到保护。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果写入表达式，则不到。

trans-unit.source: The path of a field or property.
trans-unit.target: 字段或属性的路径。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，创建当前的深层副本<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of the current <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当前的深层副本<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, decompiles the custom expression into string form.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，反编译为字符串格式的自定义表达式。

trans-unit.source: A mutable string for the decompiled expression.
trans-unit.target: 反编译的表达式的可变字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method should append the decompiled syntax for this subexpression.
trans-unit.target: 此方法应该追加此子表达式反编译的语法。

trans-unit.source: The parent code expression.
trans-unit.target: 父代码表达式。

trans-unit.source: This can be used to determine operator precedence, and whether this subexpression needs to be parenthesized.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用于确定运算符优先级和此子表达式是否需要是用圆括号括起来。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, evaluates the custom expression.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，计算自定义的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> to execute the expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref>要执行表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult"></xref> that indicates the result of the rule execution.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionResult"> </xref>指示规则执行结果。

trans-unit.source: Compares the current expression to another expression to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较当前表达式与另一个表达式，以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The expression to compare the current expression to.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的当前表达式的表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show that the expressions are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要显示的表达式相等。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the expression is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，验证表达式配置正确且没有错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref>若要管理验证过程。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression is being written to; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the expression is not being written to.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果写入表达式，则受到保护。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果写入表达式，则不到。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo"></xref> for the expression.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo"> </xref>的表达式。
